info.description:
## LitPAD API built with Fiber and GORM

### WEBSOCKETS:

#### Notifications

- URL: `wss://{host}/api/v1/ws/notifications`

- Requires authorization, so pass in the Bearer Authorization header.

- You can only read and not send notification messages into this socket.
info.title: LITPAD API

get.description: `Retrieves minimal book data, counts and other metrics`

parameters.description: User Growth to filter by in days
parameters.name: user_growth_filter

get.description: Retrieves a list of books with support for pagination and optional filtering based on book title.

parameters.description: Title of the book to filter by
parameters.name: title

parameters.description: name or username of the book author to filter by
parameters.name: name

get.description: This endpoint allows an admin to view details of a book
Retrieves a list of a particular author books with support for pagination and optional filtering based on book title.

parameters.description: Title of the book to filter by
parameters.name: title

get.description: Retrieves a list of book contracts with support for pagination and optional filtering based on contract status.

parameters.description: Name of the author to filter by
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: status of the contract to filter by
parameters.name: contract_status

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of book contracts

post.description: Add a new genre to the app.

get.description: Retrieve sections with sub sections.

post.description: Add a new book section to the app.
Add a new book subsection to the app.

get.description: Retrieve a single sub section.
Add a book to a subsection.
Remove a book from a subsection and adjust order of remaining books.

post.description: Add a new tag to the app.

put.description: Update a tag to the app.

delete.description: Delete a tag from the app.

get.description: Retrieves a list of a featured content and optional filtering based on location.

post.description: Add a featured content.

put.description: This endpoint allows an admin to change the amount of a plan

get.description: Retrieves a list of current transactions with support for pagination and optional filtering based on username.
Retrieves a list of subscribers with support for pagination and optional filtering based on user subscription type or status.

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of user subs

get.description: Retrieves a list of user profiles with support for pagination and optional filtering based on user account type.

parameters.description: Type of user to filter by
parameters.name: account_type

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of user profiles

post.description: Updates the account type of a specified user ot an admin and/or author.

put.description: Updates the account type of a specified user.

get.description: Allows the admin to deactivate/reactivate a user.

post.description:
`This endpoint generates new access and refresh tokens for authentication via facebook`
`Pass in token gotten from facebook client authentication here in payload to retrieve tokens for authorization`

`This endpoint generates new access and refresh tokens for authentication via google`
`Pass in token gotten from gsi client authentication here in payload to retrieve tokens for authorization`
This endpoint generates new access and refresh tokens for authentication

get.description: This endpoint logs a user out from our application
This endpoint logs a user out from every device
get.summary: Logout a user from all devices

post.description: This endpoint refresh tokens by generating new access and refresh tokens for a user
`This endpoint registers new users into our application.`
`This endpoint resends new otp to the user's email.`
`This endpoint sends new password reset link to the user's email.`
`This endpoint verifies the password reset token and set new password.`
`This endpoint verifies a user's email.`

get.description: `This endpoint checks the validity of a password reset token.`
This endpoint views a latest books

post.description: This endpoint allows a writer to create a book

get.description: This endpoint views a latest books by an author
get.summary: View Latest Books By A Particular Author

put.description:
`This endpoint allows a writer to update a chapter in his/her book`
`Chapter status: DRAFT, PUBLISHED, TRASH`
put.summary: Update A Chapter of a Book

delete.description: This endpoint allows a writer to delete a chapter from a book

get.description: `This endpoint allows a user to like/unlike a comment or a reply (a kind of toggle)`

put.description: `This endpoint allows a user to edit his/her paragraph comment.`

delete.description: `This endpoint allows a user to delete his/her paragraph comment.`

get.description:
`This endpoint views a single chapter of a book`
`An inactive subscriber can only view the chapter if its the first one`

`This endpoint view comments of a single paragraph of a chapter`
`An inactive subscriber can only view the paragraph comment if its the first one`
get.summary: View Comments Of A Paragraph of A Chapter

post.description: `This endpoint allows a user to add a comment in a paragraph to a book chapter.`
post.summary: Add A Comment To A Paragraph In A Book Chapter

put.description: `This endpoint allows a user to edit his/her reply`

delete.description: `This endpoint allows a user to delete his/her reply`

post.description: `This endpoint allows a user to reply a book review.`
post.summary: Reply A Review Or A Paragraph Comment

put.description: `This endpoint allows a user to edit his/her book review.`

delete.description: `This endpoint allows a user to delete his/her book review.`

get.description: `This endpoint returns replies of a book review or paragraph comment`
This endpoint views a single book

put.description: This endpoint allows a writer to update a book

post.description:
`This endpoint allows a user to review a book.`
`The author cannot review his own book.`
`Only the reader who has bought the book can review the book.`
`A reader cannot add multiple reviews to a book.`

delete.description: This endpoint allows a writer to delete a book

post.description:
`This endpoint allows a writer to add a chapter to his/her book`
`Chapter status: DRAFT, PUBLISHED, TRASH`
post.summary: Add A Chapter to a Book

get.description: This endpoint allows a user to bookmark a book

`This endpoint views chapters of a book`
`A Guest user will view just the first chapter`
`An Authenticated user will view all the chapters if he's subscribed or he gets only the first chapter`
`The owner will view all chapters of the book`

post.description: This endpoint allows a user to report a book
`This endpoint allows a user to create/update a contract for his/her book`

get.description: This endpoint allows a user to vote a book
This endpoint allows a user to view his/her bookmarked books
This endpoint views available book genres
This endpoint allows a user to convert coins to lanterns
This endpoint views available book sections
This endpoint views available book sub sections
This endpoint views available book tags
This endpoint retrieves few details of the site/application.

post.description: This endpoint creates a newsletter subscriber in our application

get.description: This endpoint shows a user gifts that can be sent
This endpoint allows a writer to view all gifts that was sent to him/her
get.summary: View All Gifts Sent To A Writer

parameters.description: Filter by claimed value: CLAIMED or NOT_CLAIMED
parameters.name: claimed

get.description: This endpoint allows a writer to claim a gift
This endpoint allows a user to send a gift

parameters.description: Slug of the gift being sent
parameters.name: gift_slug

get.description: This endpoint checks the health of our application.
This endpoint allows a user to view his/her notificatios

post.description: This endpoint allows a user to read his/her notification.

get.description: This endpoint views a user profile
`This endpoint allows a user to follow or unfollow a writer`.

parameters.description: Username of the user to follow or unfollow
parameters.name: username

400.description: Returns an error for invalid request parameters.

403.description: Returns an error when trying to follow a user that isn't a writer

404.description: Returns an error when either the user to follow or the follower user does not exist.

500.description: Returns an error when there is an internal server error or a transaction fails.

patch.description: This endpoint updates a user's profile

parameters.example: I'm here to read good books
parameters.name: bio

put.description: This endpoint updates a user's password

post.description: Adds a user to the waitlist.

post.description: This endpoint allows a user to buy coins
`This endpoint creates a new ICP wallet`

parameters.description: Slug of the gift being sent
parameters.name: gift_slug

get.description: This endpoint returns user ICP wallet balance
Retrieves a list of available subscription plans.

post.description: This endpoint allows a user to create a subscription for books

get.description: This endpoint returns all transactions of a user

BearerAuth.description: Type 'Bearer jwt_string' to correctly set the API Key
